elementary OS is created and used by peo: elementary OS는 전세계 사람들에 의해 만들어지고 사용됩니다. 여러 언어로 번역을 함으로써 더욱 나은 경험을 만드는데 도움을 주세요.
elementary OS uses an open, collaborativ: elementary OS uses an open, collaborative translation tool on Launchpad called Rosetta.
Our website is also openly translated us: Our website is also openly translated using an online platform called Transifex.
&ldquo;Websites should look good from th: “Websites should look good from the inside and out”
Our website is built using HTML, CSS, PH: Our website is built using HTML, CSS, PHP and JavaScript. We're always looking for people experienced in those areas who would like to contribute and make it even better. Most of the design work is done by our Design Team, but we love design ideas and feedback for our Web Team.
&ldquo;Great design is making something: “Great design is making something memorable and meaningful.”
Every project begins with an idea. Our D: Every project begins with an idea. Our Design Team takes these and turns them into road maps. We break up design into two components:
A great place for visual designers to ge: A great place for visual designers to get started is by sharing mockups with our Google+ Community
We use a system on Launchpad called Blue: We use a system on Launchpad called Blueprints to create detailed explanations of new features.
&ldquo;Before software can be reusable i: “Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable”
Our desktop environment and all its apps: Our desktop environment and all its apps are built using Vala, GTK+, Clutter, Cairo, Granite and a number of other free libraries. All of our code is hosted on Launchpad.net, a free service for open source projects. We're always looking for contributors of all skill levels.
&ldquo;Do what you love and the money wi: “Do what you love and the money will follow.”
BountySource puts funds directly in the: BountySource puts funds directly in the hands of developers by rewarding them for committing fixes or creating new features. Set a bounty on the issues that matter to you most or fund a specific app. You can also set up a recurring subscription.
Patreon works like an ongoing crowdfundi: Patreon works like an ongoing crowdfunding campaign. Choose an amount, get rewards, and help us reach our goals.
PayPal is a quick and easy solution. Cho: PayPal is a quick and easy solution. Choose a one-time amount or set up a subscription.
